definition: to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
to take responsibility/to bear responsibility/to be responsible

sentences.english: Many southerners said all of the North was responsible for the raid.
sentences.chinese: 許多南方人說，所有的北方人都應該對這次襲擊負責。

sentences.english: The team of contributors is generally responsible for the project area and everything in it.
sentences.chinese: 貢獻者組成的團隊一般負責該項目區域和其中的一切。

sentences.english: As a safeguard, officers-in-charge of departments are requested to verify identification by comparing signatures.
sentences.chinese: 爲安全起見，部門負責主管應比對簽字檢驗身份。

sentences.english: Clerked at One-and-One clothes Store in charge of sales, 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年，在一加一服裝店當店員，負責銷售。

sentences.english: Big brother says the paper is due tomorrow, or else.
sentences.chinese: 老師說，論文明天應交，否則後果由個人負責。

sentences.english: CCS will not be liable for any loss due to any error of the applicant or any other person.
sentences.chinese: 本社對因申請方或他人的過錯造成的損失不負責。

sentences.english: Different teams work on the Bolivia site and the Brazil site.
sentences.chinese: 玻利維亞站點和巴西站點由不同的團隊負責。

sentences.english: Who could have predicted that within ten years hed be in charge of the whole company?
sentences.chinese: 誰曾能預料到在十年內他會成爲整個公司的負責人？

sentences.english: The developer is under the family, is responsible for land which digests encircles .
sentences.chinese: 開發商是“下家”，負責消化圈來的土地。

sentences.english: Currently, I'm the general engineer of Shenyang Machine Tools Plant in charge of Quality control.
sentences.chinese: 目前我任瀋陽機械工具廠總工程師，負責質量控制。

sentences.english: The Government of Japan will receive further signatures, as the Depositary of the ACTA.
sentences.chinese: 作爲協定受託國，日本國政府將負責接收進一步簽名。

sentences.english: To be responsible for the party-masses work of Administration and its directly affiliated institutions.
sentences.chinese: 負責局機關及直屬單位的黨羣工作。
我會告訴負責退房的人。

sentences.english: Each of the services groupings engages a subject area.
sentences.chinese: 其中每個服務分組負責某個主題領域。

sentences.english: I've been tasked with psychoanalyzing Jack after his mental breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在負責對崩潰後的傑克使用精神分析療法。

sentences.english: Arnesen has been given the role of head talent scout, in charge of uncovering football talents.
sentences.chinese: 阿內森被任命爲球探總管，負責發掘足球天才。

definition: picul (100 catties, 50 kg)/two buckets full/carrying pole and its load/classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole
to undertake/to carry/to shoulder/to take responsibility
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
